description: Ruins of an ancient city, located in modern Syria. Inscribed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 2011 as part of the "Ancient Villages of Northern Syria."

properties.description: Ruins of the ancient city of Ba'uda. Coordinates determined by eye in Google Earth in November 2012, following description in UNESCO World Heritage List.
